foxcottage.Season: Mid-June to Mid-September – minimum stay of one week
foxcottage.SeasonPrice: 1050 euros per week, each additional night 150 euros.
foxcottage.OffSeason: October to May – minimum stay of four days
foxcottage.OffSeasonPrice: 800 euros per week or 115 euros per night
foxcottage.Additional: If you are interested in renting and connecting both gites for a large group there will be a discount depending on the number of people and length of stay. Contact us for further details.

castorslodge.Season: Mid-June to Mid-September – minimum stay of one week
castorslodge.SeasonPrice: 2100 euros per week, each additional night 300 euros.
castorslodge.OffSeason: October to May – minimum stay of four days
castorslodge.OffSeasonPrice: 1500 euros per week or 215 euros per night
castorslodge.Additional: If you are interested in renting and connecting both gites for a large group there will be a discount depending on the number of people and length of stay. Contact us for further details.
